import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react"; import React from "react"; import Jayalogo from "../assets/logo3.png"; import Bdlogo from "../assets/BD.png"; import Cricketlogo from "../assets/cricket-player-batting-CC2TRA (1).jpg"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const menuRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const handleClickOutside = (event) => { if (menuRef.current && !menuRef.current.contains(event.target)) { setIsOpen(false); } }; document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); }, []); return (
